original_title: Pam Ann Live - Come Fly With Me
overview: Pam Ann, A-List Hostess to the stars touches down for one night only with a sell out show at London's Bloomsbury Theatre.  Glamorous, glitzy and wildly hilarious, Pucci Clad Pam has toured with Cher, crewed private jets for Elton John, and even Madonna is a fan! So, welcome aboard, fasten your seat belts, stow your designer luggage, and prepare for the flight of your life
title: Pam Ann Live - Come Fly With Me
